price: Hayyama Isaatiin gara Rabbiitti waamaafi ifaa (haqa) ibsaa ta’e goonee (si ergine).
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
